Reviews.Title: Nexus S 4G - Fluid
Reviews.Author: BCEvo
Reviews.Content: This phone is a great as the reviews make it out to be. I'm avid about checking multiple websites to gain an understanding of phones before I purchase them.Everyone was spot on abou this line of phones. The display quality is ridiculously clear and vibrant.Kudos to the Nexus S 4G from Sprint!

Reviews.Title: Works Well
Reviews.Author: Jowanza
Reviews.Content: I got this phone because I'm waiting for the iOS 6, Windows 8 and Android storms to blow over before I decide which platform to commit too.  I really enjoy Android 4.0 and the other offerings of this phone.  No bloatware among other things.

Reviews.Title: good but with problems
Reviews.Author: dijane
Reviews.Content: The mobile works good and come to the right time but there's some problem with the battery, this works only 2 hrs!

Reviews.Title: Love this phone
Reviews.Author: Richard Timberlake
Reviews.Content: I love this phone.  I bought it refurbished but it looks and operates like a brand new phone.  It definitely is a Sprint phone.  I went online and set it up through Sprint's website in less than 5 minutes.  Best way to not have to pay a large amount for a phone before your contract ends.

Reviews.Title: Christmas present and new solution!
Reviews.Author: Heather Brown
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone as a last minute stocking stuffer for my son.  I had prepared myself for it not coming until after Christmas.  This seller sent the phone right away and on a rush so I could get it for Christmas.It's a nice phone.  My son is very happy with it.  We had a little bit of a problem getting it set up but that was Sprints fault.  Sprint wasn't happy that we didn't buy the phone directly from them.I'm happy that we have found another solution to getting cell phones rather then signing a new two year contract. Also, my teenage son hasn't been too careful with his cellphones.  So, I'm very happy with this option.I will definantly be buying from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: Nexus Rating
Reviews.Author: Sammy
Reviews.Content: This is a good phone. The display home screen is setup nice.  I like the text message feature but find the internet to be a little slower but overall it's a great phone.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: erhi
Reviews.Content: Product was great when it came to me. It had a little damage here and their but the screen was perfect, phone was a little outdated but it was a deal to get it in this shape. First thing is suggest if you get this phone as a stand in is to get a case and a screen protector because alot of these phones scratch easily. It runs Andriod 4.1 and is smooth as long as you dont overload it with apps and keep it simple you will enjoy the phone.

Reviews.Title: That's not a good phone
Reviews.Author: ashauntie
Reviews.Content: The phone I purchsed was terrible... it kept freezing majority of the, and kicking me out of my apps.. but everything else was ok

Reviews.Title: Nexus 4G
Reviews.Author: ArbLan
Reviews.Content: Phone received on time. good condition, Battery life is poor though.I consider buying a replacement battery. Overall, I am satisfied for the price paid.

Reviews.Title: sprint refused to activate.
Reviews.Author: Pal "anonymous"
Reviews.Content: If I buy this phone im owner of the product.sprint stu@id refused to activate and the way he treated like I brought this from creglist and these are the phones are stolen phone.In a consumer country how much corporate stupid cheat common man with contract phones.This is the only reason I have from from open sourced and unlock from the factory..  so this telecom company need to lick my foot to provide service to me.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Jana
Reviews.Content: Does what it advertises. Nothing to call home about especially with everything else that is available. Good cheap phone with internet capabilities.

Reviews.Title: Carter's review
Reviews.Author: Terrell Carter Sr
Reviews.Content: first of all two thumbs up I would give it a big toe also if that counts. Shipping was extremely quick, and setting it up on my pressures was easy as well. This phone was for my son and he absolutely loves it. Surprisingly he takes care of this one better than he did any other phone he had in the past.

Reviews.Title: Google Nexus S 4G No Contract Sprint Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Anon
Reviews.Content: This phone was decent back in its day. Compared to newer Androids, this phone is slow and gets terrible battery life. Do not purchase this phone unless you can be by a charger all day.

Reviews.Title: Its okay but sprint can't assign a number
Reviews.Author: Saori L.
Reviews.Content: The phone itself worked fine.  However, when we brought the phone to Sprint shop, we were told that phone number can't be transferred even if it was unlocked phone.  There seem to be a layer of information that was stripped when it was in the process to become unlocked.  We ended up upgrading and contracting again so my daugher can get a new phone.  I feel bad of what happened since my daugher really liked it but all the music she stored in Google Nexus was gone when Sprint shop reset it to make it work.

Reviews.Title: Purchased 2 phones
Reviews.Author: Asan Turdiev
Reviews.Content: Seller is great. 1 of the phones had odd problem (kept crashing while trying to update to Jelly Bean) but was replaced without any headaches. I am giving 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: LUV the phone
Reviews.Author: Joyce Anderson-
Reviews.Content: I am not a techie,this phone suits me and I would recommend it.  It has five home screens. 16GB of internal memory(no external memory card slot) which is ok but I would prefer a memory card.  It has call forwarding and visual voice mail that you can read on the phone or online.  I love the weight and the bright screen. Very fast and responsive.  Clear calls and ok camera and videocamera. I streamed a TV show and was delighted. Responsive software, many apps, and fast wi-fi.  For those who complain about LED notification, there is an app that alerts me for emails and texts - so far very happy.

Reviews.Title: Precisely what I wanted
Reviews.Author: USS_Voyager
Reviews.Content: I ordered the phone as a replacement for the same model that I had, since I cracked the screen. The order arrived in time, the used phone was in good (as or better than expected) condition, and setting it up was a breeze. In addition to the protective packaging for the whole shipment, the phone even came with a protective styrofoam pouch for the foam itself, which I can now use to protect the phone when not in use. Quite happy with my order.

Reviews.Title: It really is Brilliant
Reviews.Author: Augustine
Reviews.Content: This phone really is magnificent. No contract. No strings attached. Just pure Google. I contemplated between an unlocked Nexus S vs. the Sprint no contract one but really this was the best decision, when considering the price was considerably less and I don't plan on getting a contract with any phone company. I call/text for free  (voIP) through gvoice and talkatone and sync all my data through my Google account to the phone seamlessly.Updated Ice Cream Sandwich (Android 4.0.4) is a blast and the phone's original battery lasts surprisingly long. I recommend buying it New or used but "Like New" just to avoid any scratches or dents on the phone that might annoy you. Overall, you can't go wrong buying this phone. This the first phone I've bought for myself and it's currently the best phone I've ever used.

Reviews.Title: Need a great Smartphone at a great price? Look no further!
Reviews.Author: derek
Reviews.Content: Great price for this phone. I received the product quickly. Great customer service and quick respond to questions before purchase. This is such a great phone for the price! Did I say that already? This phone was released 2 years ago and runs like a top of the line smart phone. It came preloaded with ICS (Android 4.0) which makes the phone run smooth. But once I got it, I unlocked, rooted, and installed JellyBean (Android 4.1.1 latest version) and this thing is much more buttery smooth.  Very Impressed! Been running this phone for over a week and had No problems. The colors on the screen are vibrant (installing a custom kernel can improve this too), camera is good, no dropped calls, 4G speeds work (great for tethering). The only cons would be: there is no external SD card support (16gb internal is still good enough tho), attracts alot of fingerprints, and just average battery life (but I solved this buy just buying a backup for about 4 bucks here on AMAZON) but these are all minor cons to me. I'm a satisfied customer!

Reviews.Title: Nexus S
Reviews.Author: Mike Miller
Reviews.Content: Great phone for a great price. There are newer faster phones but this one does a fine job. ICS makes it almost as nice as my Galaxy Nexus.

Reviews.Title: Great!!!
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: This phone looks brand new and works great!  Thanks again ! Ps where's my car charger you promised me lol

Reviews.Title: Did Not Work
Reviews.Author: Rosie Aragon
Reviews.Content: MINI USB plug did not charge. Phone would rapidly die in 2hrs, after being fully charged. Completely unsatisfied with phone.

Reviews.Title: Google Phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone. I love it. it does everything i want it to and more. every day is a learning experience. I would buy this again and again.

Reviews.Title: Really nice phone and great service.
Reviews.Author: Joseph Ferguson
Reviews.Content: I bought this used so that I didn't have to extend my Sprint contract. Sprint's system messed up when I activated it, but that was straightened out in a couple of days.The seller did a great job. The phone is in near perfect condition and I got it a couple of days after I ordered it.The phone feels great, has been rock solid reliable, and Android ICS is really nice.My only gripes are:1. Reception both on Sprint and WiFi seem weak.2. It's pretty hard to read in bright light.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Miku Hatsune "~Miku"
Reviews.Content: Received this phone a day or two before the expected date, and it was worth it! The phone came with a wall charger, a separate USB cord, and it also came with a screen protector already installed! Absolutely worth the $50 I paid for it and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a good phone for cheap.

Reviews.Title: Interim replacement, does the job
Reviews.Author: Overkill0084
Reviews.Content: Purchased as a replacement for my wife's damaged beyond cost effective repair Galaxy Epic SII.  As a now older phone, one must keep expectations in check.  It's a lightweight decent quality phone with  a clean Android operating system.  I have a Nexus 7, so I liked the setup.  For the money ($75) it's hard to really complain, considering that any large step up would cost significantly more.  Our contract ends in March, at which time Sprint will be re evaluated and this phone will very likely be replaced with a Galaxy S4 or similar.

Reviews.Title: Don't be a hero...
Reviews.Author: Nick Guerra
Reviews.Content: Great phone. It may be an older model than most of the fancy Android devices, but it still runs Android 4.1.1 Jelly Bean extremely well. Considering it's a year until my upgrade you can't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Donah Hunter
Reviews.Content: Arrived before expected.was in great condition.very easy to set up.and was very easy to figure out. Minor issues with pi

Reviews.Title: No money and no phone
Reviews.Author: CC
Reviews.Content: First, we had to clean out the phone to charge it. It was filled with lint and something else that was sticky. Then, after charging the phone, we called Sprint to activate the phone only to find out that the phone did not have a Sprint registered ESN. I contacted the seller to get the correct number to activate the phone and was asked to provide all the numbers on the phone which I did. The seller promised to call Sprint and never replied that the numbers were ineffective however having worked for a wireless company for 3 years, I found that this phone would never activate through Sprint. I returned the phone according the return shipping instructions via USPS and the seller supposedly has not received this phone, even though he promised to refund me for the phone. I will report it lost or stolen so that the seller will not be able to sell this defective phone to someone else, thereby doubling his money. This company is a scam and a rip off and I am seriously considering not using Amazon anymore either. A shame, really, because I really like the concept of Amazon and have used Amazon for a few years and spent a decent amount of money here.

Reviews.Title: Wrong back
Reviews.Author: Wildcat
Reviews.Content: Sent with wrong back, was refurbished company was good just didn't ever get replacement for it, also bought another back just for the phone from another company and it didn't fit either, something wrong with nexus backs I guess, not that it matters any longer its outdated and wasn't good when I t was released.

Reviews.Title: Bad ESN
Reviews.Author: Devin
Reviews.Content: Over all the phone was great, instantly updated to the newest android OS, jelly bean.  This good feeling of satisfaction was soon killed when I tried activating this device.  Sprint informed me that masterdeals had sold me a phone that was flagged in their system as "lost or stolen" and that there was nothing they could do.  Thankfully amazon had fulfillment on this seller and I got a full refund, I will be trying a new seller of this same phone.

ProductInfo.Features:
This product has been carefully audited and is certified to be 100% functional.
This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Google Nexus S 4G Android Smartphone Black Sprint MINT
